org.forgerock.cuppa

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.cuppa.Configuration

  • public final class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds configuration settings for Cuppa.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setTestInstantiator

        public void setTestInstantiator(TestInstantiator testInstantiator)
        Sets the class that will be used to instantiate test classes. Use this function if your test classes require additional steps to instantiate, such as automatic dependency injection.
        Parameters:
        testInstantiator - A class that instantiates test classes.

      • registerTestTreeTransform

        public void registerTestTreeTransform(java.util.function.Function<TestBlock,TestBlock> transform)
        Register a transform. This will be called with the root test block after instantiating all test classes on the classpath. Use this function to manipulate the tests and their hooks before they are executed.
        Parameters:
        transform - The transform. Must not be null. Must not return null.

      • setAdditionalReporter

        public void setAdditionalReporter(Reporter reporter)
        Register a reporter that will be used in addition to the primary reporter given to the runner.
        Parameters:
        reporter - The reporter. Must not be null.

      • getRunOptions

        public Options getRunOptions()
        Get the set of options that can be used by test block transforms.
        Returns:
        The run state.

      • removeCoreTestTransforms

        public void removeCoreTestTransforms()
        Remove the test transforms that are defined by the core cuppa framework. If this method is called, the ConfigurationProvider will need to make sure to add the following filters, if it intends to support the features they provide:
        • ExpressionTagTestBlockFilter
        • TagTestBlockFilter
        • OnlyTestBlockFilter
        • EmptyTestBlockFilter
